thread.title: BRIEF-Century Aluminum Company Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.26

title: BRIEF-Century Aluminum Company Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.26
text: 17 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Century Aluminum Company Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.26 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Century Aluminum Co: * MPANY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 * Q4 SALES $433.8 MILLION * QTRLY ‍SHIPMENTS 189,000​ TONNES VERSUS 184,974 TONNES IN Q3 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $426.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍“AS WE HAD FORECAST, HIGHER RAW MATERIAL COSTS IMPACTED OUR RESULTS; THIS FACTOR WILL CARRY OVER TO Q1” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
